item.title: About
item.description: Hey i’m Abdallah Khalaf, i’m a self-thaught computer programmer and electronics technician, i got interested in programming couple of years ago and started tinkering and writing programs for different platforms, ranging from web browsers to 16-bit microcontrollers. this website is an attempt to share things i discover or learn, projects, personal ideas and some opinions. contact info: contact.awkcodes@gmail.com twitter github codeberg
